article_title: Data Was Deleted From Flight Simulator of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 Pilot
article_text:
KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia—Malaysian investigators were working with the Federal Bureau of Investigation to analyze and recover data that had been deleted from a flight simulator taken from the home of the missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370's pilot.

"Local and international expertise has been recruited," said Hishammuddin Hussein,...

twitter.description: Malaysian investigators have found that some data from a flight simulator taken from the home of the missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370's pilot was deleted.
twitter.title: Data Was Deleted From Flight Simulator of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 Pilot

image.alt: Data was deleted from flight simulator of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 pilot, official says.
